name: Let My Body Go
description:
Years lying in a sarcophagus fueled desire for worldly pleasures. Use your tools to escape the pyramid. Watch out for the traps!

WARNING: Unfinished and buggy
Create for the 2020 Extra Credits Game Jam.

Credits
  • Josef Bertolini - Programming
  • Ryan Green - Programming
  • Karim Najib - Level Design & VFX
  • Lyndon de la Torre - Level Design, Programming & Audio
  • Nichole Wong - UI Design & UI Programming

Additional Credits

  • amusedArt - Mummy model & rig
